channel.title: Battlefield 1943 PC?
channel.description:
What the hell is going on with this game? It came out on shitty consoles mid-2009, with a promise to release on PC a few months later. Then it was moved back to late 2009, then early 2010, here we are basically in 2011 and, while they have been [url=http://eastore.ea.com/store/ea/en_US/DisplayProductDetailsPage/ThemeID.718200/productID.128558100]taking preorders[/url] all this time there is still no announced release date I could find anywhere. It's like Duke Nukem forever except it came out on consoles and they are taking pre-orders. Bastards.
I've always loved the Battlefield series and have bought and paid for every single game and expansion they released, I even bought 1942 3 times so my brothers and I could all play at the same time. So this is particularly pissing me off. And before you ask "don't you have a PS3?" the answer is yes I do, but I can't aim a gun with a joystick when a mouse is so much better, not to mention I refuse to update my PS3 firmware and lose the ability to run Linux on it, but that's a rant for another day...
Conclusion: EA (and Sony) are huge mother-fucking bastards.

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I don’t suppose anyone has heard any updates on this issue have they? Looks like they are still taking people’s money for pre-orders (and raking in a shit load of interest from that money, no doubt…)

@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Wizzup?, post:11, topic:360302”]What’s wrong with good old battlefield 1942?
I still play it from time to time, even have it set up and ready at my server. :)[/quote]

Nothing, I love battlefield 1942! I’m not sure I want to play with you though, didn’t you used to be the top-ranked player or something along those lines? I haven’t played it for probably over a year, and still only casually then.

item.title: Battlefield 1943 PC?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:9, topic:360302”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=456733.msg3344225#msg3344225 date=1284688192]

Yeah fucking right they are improving the graphics, or anything else for that matter.

It’s obvious they just can’t be arsed to pay for more than one developer in a storage closet to work on the port and the console code is shitty so it’s a much bigger job than it should be.

I think you meant they aren’t improving the graphics, the game is already written, if they wait too long it will look like Doom does now by the time it’s released.
[/quote]
I was using sarcasm to express my disbelief that they are improving anything at all. Perhaps my addition of an expletive made it slightly ambiguous.[/quote]

It was the ‘or anything else for that matter’ that didn’t really make sense to me, regardless, carry on.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield 1943 PC?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:4, topic:360302”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=456733.msg3342863#msg3342863 date=1284542770]
Give it time, the longer it takes the better the game will be. Its worth the wait, just like Duke Nukem. Better releasing it nowa days with better graphics rather than back then with 8 bit graphics
[/quote]
What the fuck are you on about? Duke Nukem or Battlefield? Either way screw ‘better graphics’. If the gameplay is good, that’s all that matters to me.[/quote]

TabbyKiller:

Give it time, the longer it takes the more time they get to imporve it. Its worth the wait, just like Duke Nukem. Better releasing it nowa days with better graphics rather than back then with 8 bit graphics

EDIT Battlefield - Duke Nukem - little bit of both

sorry, i have problems explaining what I mean =\

@moparisthebest wrote:

What the hell is going on with this game? It came out on shitty consoles mid-2009, with a promise to release on PC a few months later.
